name: Outrider
description: Pathfinders who have embraced the role of merciless frontier enforcers, using their unparalleled wilderness skills to hunt down enemies and control territory through fear and superior mobility.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and traversal techniques
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and traversal techniques
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Resting in natural environments increases stamina regeneration rate by 500%
Depleted stamina causes penalties to movement speed and attack rate
Can channel stamina into enhanced mobility or combat techniques
Successful kills instantly restore a portion of stamina

resource_systems.name: Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration that enhances awareness and precision
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per minute, additional points gained through successful tracking or hunting
mechanics: Focus can be spent to enhance accuracy of attacks
Can be used to heighten senses for tracking and detection
Acts as a resource for tactical abilities
Maximum focus increases when in pursuit
Can be used to identify target weaknesses and escape routes
Inflicting fear or pain on targets restores Focus

resource_systems.name: Nature's Blessing
resource_systems.description: Mystical connection to the natural world that grants special abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when in harmony with nature, decreases in corrupted or unnatural environments
mechanics: Increases by 15 when dominating territory or eliminating intruders
Increases by 10 per hour when in pristine wilderness
Decreases by 15 when harming natural environments
Decreases by 10 per hour when in heavily urbanized or corrupted areas
Can be spent to commune with nature spirits or enhance nature-based abilities
Has been twisted to enhance territorial control and intimidation

resource_systems.name: Dread Presence
resource_systems.description: Aura of fear and intimidation that breaks the will of enemies
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when instilling fear or dominating opponents
mechanics: Increases by 10 when successfully intimidating targets
Increases by 20 when breaking an enemy's will to fight
Decreases by 5 per hour when not actively asserting dominance
Can be spent to enhance fear effects or create powerful intimidation displays
At maximum Dread Presence, enemies may flee or surrender rather than face you

class_mechanics.name: Territorial Dominance
class_mechanics.description: Supernatural ability to control and defend territory
effects: Can mark territory that grants you significant advantages while within it
Sense all intruders in your territory automatically
Movement speed and combat abilities enhanced in your territory
Can set painful or lethal traps throughout your domain
Presence causes unease and fear in those who trespass

class_mechanics.name: Relentless Hunter
class_mechanics.description: Unstoppable pursuit capabilities that make escape impossible
effects: Can track targets with supernatural accuracy across any distance
Movement speed increases the longer you pursue a single target
Gain resistance to fatigue and environmental hazards during pursuit
Can predict escape routes and cut off retreat paths
Presence induces panic in fleeing targets, causing them to make mistakes

class_mechanics.name: Brutal Efficiency
class_mechanics.description: Mastery of quick, devastating attacks that cripple or kill
effects: Attacks target vulnerabilities for maximum damage
Can inflict crippling wounds that severely limit target mobility
Gain combat advantages against wounded or frightened targets
Each successful strike reveals additional weaknesses to exploit
Killing blows are particularly devastating, serving as warnings to others

class_mechanics.name: Fear Tactics
class_mechanics.description: Ability to manipulate and exploit fear in targets
effects: Can sense fear in any creature within 100 meters
Able to magnify existing fears to crippling levels
Can create terrifying displays that break enemy morale
Gain power from the fear you generate in others
Presence alone can cause weaker enemies to flee or surrender

signature_abilities.name: Reign of Terror
signature_abilities.description: Unleash a wave of supernatural fear that breaks enemy will to fight
mechanics: All enemies within 50 meters must make a Wisdom save or flee in terror
Even on successful saves, enemies suffer combat penalties from fear
Fleeing enemies leave clear trails and make critical mistakes
Each affected enemy increases your combat abilities temporarily
Particularly weak-willed enemies may surrender or die from shock
Costs 75 Stamina, 10 Focus, and 50 Dread Presence

signature_abilities.name: Unstoppable Advance
signature_abilities.description: Enter a state of relentless pursuit that cannot be stopped by any means
mechanics: For 5 minutes, movement speed increased by 200%
Ignore all terrain penalties, barriers, and environmental hazards
Cannot be slowed, stopped, or hindered by any means
Leave a trail of destruction that damages and slows any who follow you
Can crash through walls and obstacles without slowing down
Costs 50 Stamina, 8 Focus, and 75 Nature's Blessing

signature_abilities.name: Mark of the Hunter
signature_abilities.description: Place an inescapable mark on a target that ensures their eventual doom
mechanics: Mark a target within sight, creating a supernatural bond
Always know the exact location and condition of the marked target
Gain significant combat advantages against the marked target
Target cannot hide, disguise themselves, or use stealth effectively
If the target dies while marked, gain tremendous power for 1 hour
Costs 100 Stamina, 15 Focus, and 100 Dread Presence

skill_trees.name: Path of the Conqueror
key_abilities: Domain Lord: Establish a territory where you have near-absolute power
Brutal Example: Execute enemies in ways that terrify all who witness it
Resource Control: Deny enemies access to food, water, and shelter in your territory

skill_trees.name: Path of the Executioner
key_abilities: Killing Blow: Strike that instantly kills targets below 30% health
Crippling Strike: Permanently disable a limb or function with a precise attack
Pain Master: Inflict wounds that cause overwhelming pain, incapacitating targets

skill_trees.name: Path of the Pursuer
key_abilities: Nowhere to Hide: Detect hidden targets within 100 meters automatically
Tireless Hunter: Move at full speed for days without rest when pursuing prey
Cut Off Escape: Predict and block all possible escape routes

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Pathfinder skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Evil alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Establish complete control over a contested territory
Hunt down and eliminate a target that has eluded all others

legendary_items.name: Bow of Certain Death
effects: Strength increased by 5
Arrows fired from this bow cause wounds that cannot be healed normally
Mark of the Hunter cooldown reduced by 1 day

legendary_items.name: Boots of the Endless Hunt
effects: Movement speed increased by 50%
Leave no tracks unless you choose to
Can run across any surface, including water, quicksand, or lava

legendary_items.name: Helm of Dread
effects: Dread Presence regeneration increased by 100%
Your appearance becomes increasingly terrifying as you gain Dread Presence
Enemies who meet your gaze must make a Wisdom save or be paralyzed with fear

lore: Outriders represent the most feared and ruthless path a Pathfinder can take, becoming merciless enforcers who use their unparalleled wilderness skills to control territory and hunt down those who oppose them. These territorial predators have twisted their connection to nature into a tool for domination, establishing domains where they rule through fear and superior mobility. The path to becoming an Outrider requires not just exceptional skill in tracking and survival, but also a willingness to use terror as a weapon and a desire for control that borders on obsession. Outriders often serve as enforcers for powerful factions or warlords, patrolling borderlands and hunting down enemies with relentless efficiency. Some establish their own territories in lawless frontiers, ruling through fear and brutal examples made of those who challenge their authority. Their reputation for unstoppable pursuit makes them particularly effective at capturing fugitives or eliminating rivals, as those marked by an Outrider know that escape is virtually impossible. Though they possess tremendous power, Outriders are ultimately driven by a desire for control—over territory, over others, and over their own destiny—making them dangerous allies and terrifying enemies.
